thread.title: How Facebook can insulate Instagram from privacy scandal

title: How Facebook can insulate Instagram from privacy scandal
text:
How Facebook can insulate Instagram from privacy scandal Saturday, April 14, 2018 - 01:58 
The photo-sharing site may be worth more than 80 times what the social network founded by Mark Zuckerberg paid six years ago. Now, though, the data leaks engulfing its corporate parent risk becoming a liability. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The photo-sharing site may be worth more than 80 times what the social network founded by Mark Zuckerberg paid six years ago. Now, though, the data leaks engulfing its corporate parent risk becoming a liability. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2HAdKwF
